name: Perer Lipowicz

standard.title: Ventilation for Acceptable Indoor Air Quality

grant: I hereby grant the American Society of Heating, Refrigerating and Air-Conditioning Engineers (ASHRAE) the non-exclusive royalty rights, including non-exclusive royalty rights in copyright, in my proposals and I understand that I acquire no rights in publication of this standard in which my proposals in this or other similar release.
proposed_changes: Provide substantiation for change to occupant acceptability and for the values used for Rg
substantiating_statements: The values in Table A.3.1 showing a comparison of outdoor air rates calculated by the Simple Systems approach versus 62-1989 are disturbing. In some cases the rates are less than one-third of the 62-1989 values; in others the rates are greater by a factor of three or more. The rationale in Appendix A is insufficient to justify such drastic changes.
